sections.title: Getting Started
sections.content:
Welcome to SOLIS (Singlet Oxygen Luminescence Investigation System)!

1. **Load Data**: Use File → Open Folder to select a directory containing your decay files
2. **Select Compounds**: Check the compounds you want to analyze in the Data Browser
3. **Run Analysis**: Choose Analysis → Homogeneous → Kinetics and QY
4. **View Results**: Results appear in the browser tabs (Kinetics, Statistics, Quantum Yield)
5. **Generate Plots**: Right-click compounds or results to create plots

sections.title: File Menu
sections.content:
**Open Folder**: Load data files from a directory

**Save Session**: Save your current work (data, results, plots, settings) to a .solis.json file

**Load Session**: Restore a previously saved session

**Export Results**: Export kinetics results and statistics to CSV files

**Reset Session**: Clear all data and start fresh

sections.title: Analysis Types
sections.content:
**Homogeneous Analysis**:
• Kinetics and QY: Analyze homogeneous decay kinetics and calculate quantum yields
• Linearity Check: Study variation of α with absorption or excitation intensity

**Heterogeneous (Vesicle) Analysis**:
• 3-exponential fit for heterogeneous systems with lipid/water compartments
• Grid search optimization for τ_Δ(water) and τ_Δ(lipid)

**Surplus Analysis**:
• 4-step method for heterogeneous systems
• Can run automatically after homogeneous analysis

sections.title: File Naming Convention
sections.content:
**Decay Files**:
Decay_[Compound]_EX[λ]nm_tauD[value]_QY[value]_QYsd[sd]_EI[value][unit].csv

Example:
Decay_TMPyP_EX400nm_tauD3.5_QY0.98_QYsd0.08.csv

**Absorption Files**:
Abs_[Compound].csv

Example:
Abs_TMPyP.csv

sections.title: SNR Thresholds
sections.content:
Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR) thresholds determine data quality:

• **Homogeneous**: Default 5:1 (moderate quality required)
• **Heterogeneous**: Default 50:1 (high quality required for 3-exponential fit)

You can adjust these in Preferences → SNR Thresholds.

SNR is always displayed as a ratio (e.g., 52.6:1), not in dB.

sections.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
sections.content:
**File Menu**:
• Ctrl+O: Open Folder
• Ctrl+S: Save Session
• Ctrl+Shift+O: Load Session
• Ctrl+E: Export Results
• Ctrl+R: Reset Session
• Ctrl+Q: Exit

**Analysis Menu**:
• Ctrl+H: Homogeneous Kinetics and QY
• Ctrl+L: Linearity Check
• Ctrl+V: Heterogeneous (Vesicle) Analysis

sections.title: About SOLIS
sections.content:
SOLIS - Singlet Oxygen Luminescence Investigation System

**Version**: Beta (Ready for public release)
**License**: CC BY-NC 4.0 (Non-commercial)
**Language**: Python 3.10+ (PyQt6)

**Features**:
✓ Homogeneous decay kinetics analysis
✓ Quantum yield calculations (A-based method)
✓ Heterogeneous (vesicle) analysis with grid search
✓ Surplus analysis for heterogeneous systems
✓ Linearity checks (Beer-Lambert, Excitation Intensity)
✓ Advanced spike detection and masking
✓ Session save/load with full state preservation
✓ Absorption spectrum plotting
✓ Publication-quality matplotlib plots
